- `ip` (string) - Either an IPv4 address (CIDR notation) or `dhcp`.

- `gateway` (string) - IPv4 gateway.

- `ip6` (string) - Can be an IPv6 address (CIDR notation), `auto` (enables SLAAC), or `dhcp`.

- `gateway6` (string) - IPv6 gateway.
